info.question: What type of applications are recommended for Amazon EC2 reserved instances?
answers: Applications that have flexible start and end times
Applications being developed or tested for the first time
Applications with steady state or predictable usage
Applications that are only feasible at lower compute prices
correctAnswer: Applications with steady state or predictable usage

info.question: As AWS grows, the general cost of doing business is reduced and savings are passed back to the customer in the form of lower pricing. What is this cost optimization called?
What is NOT a consideration when estimating the cost of Amazon S3?
When calculating the cost of Amazon EC2, what factors will impact pricing?
answers: Number of items in your inboud data transfer
Number of hours Elastic Load Balancer runs
Number and size of objects stored in your Amazon S3 buckets
correctAnswer: Number of hours Elastic Load Balancer runs

info.question: What are the characteristics of the Developer Support Plan?
answers: One primary contact may open a case
Unlimited contacts may open a case
Business hours access to Cloud Support Associates via email
24/7 access to Cloud Support Engineers via email, chat, and phone
Assigned to a Technical Account Manager
correctAnswer: One primary contact may open a case
Business hours access to Cloud Support Associates via email

info.question: What AWS tool compares the cost of running your application in an on-premise data center to AWS?
What type of AWS data transfers are free?
answers: Outbound data transfer between Amazon Web Services within the same region
Inbound data transfer across all Amazon Web Services in all regions
Outbound data transfer from S3 only
Outbound data transfer across all Amazon Web Services in all regions
Inbound data transfer between Amazon Web Services within the same region
correctAnswer: Inbound data transfer across all Amazon Web Services in all regions
Outbound data transfer between Amazon Web Services within the same region

info.question: Which of the following is NOT available in the Business Support Plan?
answers: Access to Well-Architected Review delivered by AWS Solution Architects
Access to Personal Health Dashboard and Health API
Access to Cloud Support Engineers for technical issues
correctAnswer: Access to Well-Architected Review delivered by AWS Solution Architects

info.question: Which of the following is NOT included in the AWS Free Tier?
Which of the following is NOT part of the utility pricing model?
answers: Pay more per unit as you use more
Pay less per unit by using more
correctAnswer: Pay more per unit as you use more

info.question: Which two of the following would you pay less for if you reserved?
What are the three types of reserved instance arrangements?
What are the three types of reserved instance arrangements?
Which of these are true?
answers: Larger up front payment of reserved, greater discount
Tiered pricing for services such as S3, EC2
You pay the same for all S3 GBs
More you use, less you pay per GB
Data transfer out is always free
correctAnswer: Larger up front payment of reserved, greater discount
Tiered pricing for services such as S3, EC2
More you use, less you pay per GB

info.question: Since 2006 AWS has lowered pricing how many times?
What type of pricing is available for high volume projects with unique requirements?
Which of the following services are free in the Free Tier?
The three fundamental pricing areas are:
Outbound transfer is aggregated across which of the following in your monthly billing statement?
EC2 pricing varies with the following?
Which is free of charge per EC2 instance?
What is the storage service used for less frequently accessed data and is billed at a lower cost?
Which best describes EBS volumes?
answers: Off-instance (EC2) storage that exist independent of EC2 instance
Pooled disks that exist independent of EC2 instance
correctAnswer: Off-instance (EC2) storage that exist independent of EC2 instance

info.question: Which best describes EBS volumes?
answers: Off-instance (EC2) storage that exist independent of EC2 instance
Pooled disks that exist independent of EC2 instance
correctAnswer: Off-instance (EC2) storage that exist independent of EC2 instance

info.question: Which are the three types of EBS volumes?
Which of the following are NOT considered when estimating pricing of RDS instances?
Which of the following is FALSE when estimating pricing of RDS instances?
answers: Charges vary depending on how many AZs deployed to
Outbound data transfer is fixed price
correctAnswer: Outbound data transfer is fixed price

info.question: Which of the following is FALSE when estimating pricing of CloudFront?
answers: Data transfer costs vary across geographic region
Pricing based on edge location through which content is served
Amount of data transfered in to your edge locations
Geographic region in which request is made
Amount of data transfered out of your edge locations
correctAnswer: Amount of data transfered in to your edge locations

info.question: Which of the following are types of AWS support?
Which of the following are NOT types of AWS support plans?
Which of the following in the support stack is AWS responsible for in the shared support model?
Which of the following in the support stack is the customer responsible for in the shared support model?
Which of the following represents a permanent entity (person or machine/software) in the IAM service?
Which of the following represents a temporary entity (person or machine/software) in the IAM service?
Which of the following represents users or roles in the IAM service?
Which of the following represents the 'what' or authorization in the IAM service?
Which of the following represents the 'who' or authorization in the IAM service?
Which represents the 'who' can perform an activity in the IAM service?
Which represents 'what' a user or role can execute in the IAM service?
What is the name of the service that manages master keys for encryption?
Which gateway is used by VPN logged in users to gain access to subnets within a VPC?
Which gateway is used for public access to public subnets within a VPC?
What type of public EC2 instance is used to allow public access to private subnets and instances in a VPC?
What type of public EC2 instance is used to allow public access from private subnets and instances in a VPC?
What AWS services are used to secure subnet access within a VPC?
